ygData.subject: Re: Soul Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: I am going to assume, and I going to go out on a limb here, that you can get this sword by doing a quest. This makes sense, to me, because the Soulfire sword
ygData.messageBody:
I am going to assume, and I going to go out on a limb here, that you can get
this sword by doing a quest. This makes sense, to me, because the Soulfire
sword has been found(Implemented) for the Paladins and it is a quest nodrop
item. So maybe there is a quest someplace that can shed some light on this.

-Nuluk(E'ci)


> Ok, fair enough. I'm assuming that it's location remains secret, and
> that I won't have to worry about it for about 20 more levels =) (I'm
> almost 22 now) Did they mention what zone it is in?
>
> Still though, a fine blade, and everyone needs a long term quest
> (holy grail). One thing I'd like to see is a blade that has an
> aura of darkness around it, in opposition to light generating items,
> but most likely that would be very difficult to code, and the few
> human SK's might get upset, but then again they'd have deadeye by
> the time they got it most likely.
>
> Xilith
